title: Speaking of animals
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Academy awards (Motion pictures)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography - Special effects
abstract: Who's who in animal land--Monkey business--Fun on the farm--The Hillbillies--Swingin' on a star (excerpt)--The Three little sisters (excerpt)--Animal-ology--And their families
description: A selection of short films and excerpts from the forties that apply visual effects to live action footage of animals so they appear to be talking and singing. While some segments are mildly amusing, the ones that feature monkeys performing humiliating tricks are less so. "Who's who in animal land" and "And their families" won Academy Awards for Best Short Feature.
